amendment.description: To modify a provision relating to allotments under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1471, as modified, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 14 - 81. Record Vote Number: 176.

action.text: Amendment SA 1471 proposed by Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 1460. (consideration: CR S2320-2321; text as modified: CR S2314-2315) To modify a provision relating to allotments under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1471 proposed by Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 1460.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1471, as modified, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 14 - 81. Record Vote Number: 176.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1471, as modified, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 14 - 81. Record Vote Number: 176.
